SEARCH
Package UI

Class DishUI

java.lang.Object
UI.BaseUI
UI.DishUI
public class DishUI extends BaseUI
The `DishUI` class extends the `BaseUI` class and represents the user interface for managing dishes and their ingredients in the restaurant management system.

  • Field Summary

    buttons, lastSelectedButton, mainContentContainer, uiSwitcher

    • getDishDataFromDatabase

      private javafx.collections.ObservableList<Dish> getDishDataFromDatabase()
      Retrieves dish data from the database and returns an `ObservableList` of `Dish` objects.
      Returns:
      An `ObservableList` containing the dish data.

    • getIngredientsForDishFromDatabase

      private javafx.collections.ObservableList<Ingredient> getIngredientsForDishFromDatabase(int dishID)
      Retrieves the ingredients for a given dish from the database and returns an `ObservableList` of `Ingredient` objects.
      Parameters:
      dishID - The ID of the dish for which to retrieve ingredients.
      Returns:
      An `ObservableList` containing the ingredients for the specified dish.
